name: Demonic Manor 3
description:
Will you escape the scary mansion?

Escape ghosts and endure evil jumpscares in this free yet terrifying Demonic manor 3 horror game.

You are a journalist. Search all scary manor and escape from there.In 1850, a ritual happens in the mysterious mansion. Horrifying things happen between the family and the demon haunting. Yet, the mystery hasn’t been solved. Câbir from the “Uncanny Houses” Magazine will spend a night in the mansion, to investigate it.
